Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.cli.menus

Class MenuRunner

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.cli.menus.MenuRunner
public class MenuRunner
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles moving between different menus, and therefore states. Also contains various non static printing utilities.

    The CLI class for the print utilities.

    • getInstance

      public static MenuRunner getInstance()

    • run

      public void run()
      Handles switching between menus. Usually goes into a wait when a menu exits, expecting the state to change before resuming.

    • waitStateChange

      private void waitStateChange()
      Wait before going to the next menu. Is woken by the setState()

    • waitResponse

      public void waitResponse()
      Called when a method requires to receive the response before proceeding. ALWAYS to be called inside a synchronized, since it doesn't synchronize itself. This is so that the synchronized block can easily include the various methods that send the message to the server for maximum thread safety.

    • sendResponse

      public void sendResponse​(GameActions action, java.lang.String msg)
      Used to unlock from waitResponse().
      Parameters:
      action - action being unlocked.
      msg - informational message that will be printed.

    • sendResponse

      public void sendResponse​(GameActions action, GameActions newAction, java.lang.String msg)
      Used to unlock from waitResponse() when there's multiple possible outcomes for an action.
      Parameters:
      action - action being unlocked.
      newAction - new state that will be set to show what kind of response was given.
      msg - informational message that will be printed.
